FileFormat.FormatDescription: Snap Survey provides a selection of software which allows users to design surveys. The SNAP Survey archive file is an compressed version of the SNAP Meta Data and if one is present a SNAP Raw Data file. If it is a survey with email invitations, and responses, it also compresses system files about the current state of the mailing.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives
FileFormat.ProvenanceDescription: 11/2023 (v.115)- Modified the offset values from null to 0 as part of a project to match PRONOM data with the xsd standard. Internally researched.
